name: Memnook the Demon and the Fight Against Hell RPG
name_original: Memnook the Demon and the Fight Against Hell RPG
description:
Memnook returns to Earth to see how things are going, but gets met with a huge surprise. Relive the 2019 LEGO stop motion of the same name as Memnook and his team the Argonauts go to hell to stop it's ruler, Lucifer, from taking over Earth and to save another hero, Sub.

All characters in this game are made and owned by Memnook, Marvel, or Square Enix.

Music used was made by North Sound, Nstens1117, D.S. Ereki (Delia Symbols), and Noburo Uematsu.

Update Log

  • 4/16/22- Fixed the files, corrected spelling mistakes, nerfed flash (won't always blind 100% of the time), removed already filled in save files, fixed shield, fixed the costumes and rings,  nerfed a few weapons (shotgun, neutral special, iron gloves, etc.)
